about_the_game:
This is the Octo Vinctum Demo Tape



As a Demo Tape, it only contains a tiny fraction of the full game's content. You can only explore the town of Sunshineville, in which you can fight some strangers, talk to some folks, and find some treasures. The demo will end once you successfully confront Liam about fixing the internet at the Electric Lounge. Balancing may differ slightly from the full release, and some content may be missing to make this more appropriate for a demo.

fullgame.name: Octo Vinctum: Revenge of the Czar

name: Octo Vinctum Demo Tape
short_description: A JRPG/Visual Novel hybrid designed like the legendary RPGs of old! Follow Sabrina and friends as they travel across the world to defeat otherworldly forces that threaten Earth! Full of memorable characters, hidden secrets, challenging bosses and a rockin' soundtrack!
